Includes patch to version 1.06, three serials, and crack.

No modifications were made to the game disc in this release.

Installation procedure:

1.  Mount "Disc\Halo - Combat Evolved.iso" with your favorite disc-mounting
    software, and run "Setup.Exe" off the disc.

2.  Use one of the three provided serials in "serials.txt".

3.  Run the "Patch\halopc106.exe" patch.

4.  Copy "halo.exe" from the "Crack" folder to the folder where you installed
    Halo (usually "C:\Program Files\Microsoft Games\Halo"), overwriting the
    original file.

5.  Enjoy!
